content: Transform is a marketing services brand with a focus on live events and production. Our team of 5 highly skilled professionals offers a range of services, including strategy, digital campaigns, web design, live video production, and software development. Eric Russel, our head of operations, leads the team and focuses on strategy, customer relationships, and internal management. Irene Callander brings a creative touch to the brand through her expertise in communications and copywriting. John Abrams ensures that our equipment is always functioning, Liam Dawson covers a variety of projects including video editing and 3D graphics, and Benjamin Powell handles software optimization and security. Trust Transform to deliver innovative and effective marketing solutions.
